name: Gemshim Fates
description:
Gemshim Fates A Crappy 2D Version of Genshin Impact

With the World of Fates being invaded by strange forces, the Godling of the Abyss has summoned you, Hero From Another World, to destroy these otherworldly Manifestations!

To try to limit their spread, she has locked off parts of the world behind crystal doors, but it can't hold them back forever.

Explore a mini version of the World of Fates, gather resources, and summon more heroes with the special gems (called Gemshim) from the Abyss to save the world!

This game was made as a gift, and so it contains the following Characters who do not belong to me:

  • Bradley Jaks
  • Emers Lochingvyrr
  • Garth & Saul
  • Ralshir Saryx
  • Reina

Don't forget to Comment and Follow! <3
